Instruction: In a large bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, baking powder, cumin seeds, and sugar.
Divide the dough into small pieces and shape each piece into a ball.
Shape the dough into 4 equal portions. Flatten each portion into circles on a floured work surface.
Sift together the flour, salt, and baking powder in a large mixing bowl.
You can use half-and-half in place of the milk if preferred.
If preferred, you can replace cumin seeds with ground cinnamon.
